General.Name: Mnc Sky Vision Tbk
General.Description: PT MNC Sky Vision Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retransmission and marketing of satellite-based television programs in Indonesia. The company distributes satellite support equipment; offers international and local broadcasting facilities; and provides pay television broadcast, and TV advertising services. It provides its services under the Indovision brand name. The company was formerly known as PT Matahari Lintas Cakrawala and changed its name to PT MNC Sky Vision Tbk in December 2006. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia. PT MNC Sky Vision Tbk is a subsidiary of PT MNC Vision Networks Tbk.
